events.text:
[color=#ffed29]("If you have any questions regarding this judgement, please consult our Gods first, as they can respond to you the fastest considering their omnipotence, omniscience, and omnipresence.")
[color=#ffed29]("It may take five or more letters to correspond with me.")
[color=#ffed29](Not the callback to the five letters!)

[color=#ffed29](This Mother is kinda savage.)
[color=#ffed29](Maybe I should go to church more, this is kinda hilarious.)
